aboutMe.text: Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?
aboutMe.location: Where are you located? Are you open to different ways of working, such as working remotely or even relocating?
aboutMe.openMinded: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving your skills?
aboutMe.description: A brief description of your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? You can include some keywords like: analytical thinking, creativity, persistence and  collaboration.

text.eins: Show that you have used a variety of  front-end technologies in your projects.
text.zwei: Reveal enthusiasm for learning new technologies and frameworks.

myProjects.text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join.title: Join
join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

el-pollo-loco.title: El-Pollo-Loco
el-pollo-loco.description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.

simplecrm.title: simpleCRM
simplecrm.description: A very Simple Customer Relationship Management system working with CRUD functionality.

pokedex.title: Pokédex
pokedex.description: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

dabubble.title: DA Bubble
dabubble.description: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

johannes.name: Johannes Singl
johannes.feedback: Working with Lea on our project was fantastic. With her creativity, technical expertise, and solution-oriented approach, she contributed significantly to its success. Her positive attitude and ability to work well in a team made the work not only productive but also enjoyable.

text.eins: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.
text.zwei: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!

privacy.drei: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
